slides.title: Basic Directions
slides.content:
**4 Main:** North, South, East, West
**Opposite:** N-S, E-W
**Right turns:** N→E→S→W→N
**Left turns:** N→W→S→E→N

slides.title: Tips
slides.content:
**Starting point:** Always note
**Final position:** Calculate displacement
**Pythagorean theorem:** For distance
**Draw diagram:** Helps visualize
